Oil-based ink is odorless, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $4.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:57 UTC – Details)



Package includes 4 pieces of fine point black permanent markers, suitable for applying in a home, gardening, work, and other kinds of long-term marking work, which can meet your daily needs.
Mr. Pen garden marker is made of opaque ink that is chemically stable, lightfast, and quick-dry. Oil-based ink is odorless, non-toxic, acid-free, and environmentally friendly.
Durable fine round nib allows smooth and precise application. Our permanent pen markers that are short in size and have smooth and quick drying ink, can optimize your writing experience.
Mr. Pen garden markers are ideal for working on multiple surfaces; they can be applied to paintings, ceramics, wood, leather, plastic, fabric, canvas, stone, glass, metal, chalkboard, craft supplies, etc.
They are suitable for vegetable seedlings, greenhouses, gardening projects, pot experiments, etc. They will help you never lose track of what you planted.

4.5
Price: $4.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:57:57 UTC – Details)

Price: $19.99 - $14.32
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:26 UTC – Details)


Meet your new favorite coffee accessory: the Mr. Coffee Mug Warmer. Place your favorite cup of joe, tea, or cocoa on the plate, and it’ll keep it nice and hot for hoursâ€”so you can enjoy it at your leisure. It features a convenient on/off switch with an indicator light, and an extended power cord so you can use it just about anywhere.
17 watt mug warmer for use with coffee, tea, hot cocoa & more
Easy to tote and take anywhere
Surface easily wipes clean
On/off switch with indicator light
Longer power cord for increased mobility. Refer to the PDF attached below in Technical Specification for the User Manual

Read more

Experience the taste

Since 1970 the Mr. Coffee brand has been doing one thing and one thing only. .. brewing coffee. No one has served cup after delicious cup to more Americans than us.

For us, bringing a rich coffee experience into your home is our top priority. Along with coffee makers, we are here to share everything coffee with you.

Mr. Coffee Mug Warmer

Keep your favorite mug of coffee, tea or cocoa hot when you want it. The convenient on/off switch with on light indicator lets you know when it’s hot. With its extended cord length to use almost anywhere, this will be your favorite gadget!

  • Stop the worry of hot beverages going cold.
  • Easy to tote, take and use just about anywhere.
  • Surface easily wipes clean.

Read more

Keeps all your favorite hot beverages warm

On/off switch with convenient ‘on’ light indicator.

Use for coffee, tea, hot cocoa and more.

Fits many different mug styles and sizes.

Read more

  2. School & Office Supplies

    Visit the Store

  3. Bible Journaling Supplies

    Visit the Store

  4. Art Supplies

    Visit the Store

  5. Welcome to Mr. Pen!

    Having firsthand experience teaching in at-risk schools in different parts of the United States, seeing the daily struggles of students and teachers, we, a few business-minded teachers, founded Mr. Pen with a simple purpose: serving the schools in our community by providing them with high quality and affordable school supplies and tools to help them in their efforts.

  6. Our Goal:

    We founded Mr. Pen with a simple purpose to serve the schools in our community by providing them with high quality and affordable school supplies and tools to help them in their efforts.

    We want to ensure Mr. Pen can provide superior quality, the most affordable products, and amazing online shopping experience from the beginning.

    As we aim to supply excellent conventional office and school products, our team of engineers and designers will do their best job to create innovative solutions for offices and schools to maximize efficiency and learning.
